org.lappsgrid.api

Interface DataSource


  • public interface DataSource
    A DataSource returns Data objects from a source of data.

    The type of Data returned by a DataSource depends on the data source implementation. Possibilities include, but are not limited to, entire documents, segments of documents, XML documents (or fragments), single words, or lists of annotations.

    Author:
    Keith Suderman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Data get(String key) 
      Data getMetadata() 
      Data list()
      Returns a @{link Data} object containing a white-space delimited list of keys.
      Data list(int start, int end)
      Returns a @{link Data} object containing a white-space delimited sub-list of keys.
      Data query(Data query)
      Returns a data object corresponding to the given query.
      int size()
      Returns the size of this datasource, that is, the number of unique keys returned by the @{link #list} method.
